io.spine.server.entity

Interface EventPlayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggregate, AggregatePart, MirrorProjection, Projection

    @Internal
public interface EventPlayer
    Plays events upon a certain entity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EventPlayer forTransactionOf(TransactionalEntity<?,?,?> entity)
      Creates a transactional EventPlayer for the given entity.
      default void play(io.spine.core.Event event)
      Plays the given event.
      void play(java.lang.Iterable<io.spine.core.Event> events)
      Plays the given events against the underlying entity.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        void play(java.lang.Iterable<io.spine.core.Event> events)
        Plays the given events against the underlying entity.

        Typically, the entity state is changed during this operation.

        Parameters:
        events - the event stream to play

      • play

        default void play(io.spine.core.Event event)
        Plays the given event.

        This is a convenience method. See play(Iterable) for more info.

        Parameters:
        event - the event to play

      • forTransactionOf

        static EventPlayer forTransactionOf(TransactionalEntity<?,?,?> entity)
        Creates a transactional EventPlayer for the given entity.

        It is expected that the given entity is currently in a transaction. If this condition is not met, an IllegalStateException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        entity - the entity for which to create the player
        Returns:
        new instance on EventPlayer
